p: The tested microbial isolates including fungal strains and bacterial strains were provided by the American Type Culture Collection in addition to a selected multidrug resistance strain which was isolated at clinical locations in our region. The isolates comprised of three Gram-positive strains— Enterococcus faecium (ATCC 700221), Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA), and Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25923)—and three Gram-negative strains— Shigella sonnei (ATCC 25931), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC 27853), and Escherichia coli (ATCC 25922). The fungal isolates were Epidermophyton floccosum (ATCC 10231) and Candida albicans (ATCC 90028).
